name: Reconnaissance - Gather Victim Host Information (T1592)
description: Detects attempts to gather host information via PowerShell or command line utilities. Attackers often use these commands during reconnaissance to profile a system before further exploitation.
author: Wahid Hendrawan
query: process.name:(powershell.exe OR cmd.exe) AND (process.args:(*systeminfo* OR *hostname* OR *whoami* OR *ipconfig* OR *net user* OR *Get-WmiObject* OR *Win32_ComputerSystem* OR *Win32_OperatingSystem* OR *wmic*))
